summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue from a point 94 feet south of south margin of Massachusetts Street to the north line of Colman Park; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7101, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
